elements.text:
At a work party, your friend introduces you to an attractive friend of theirs you have not met before. The next morning, you notice that they sent you an email.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I make a joke in my response.
I want to ask them why they emailed me, but I decide to just see how things play out.
I talk to my friend about how excited I am.
I'm nervous about sending the perfect reply, but I decide to just be myself.
I ignore their email because I'm anxious about responding.
